notify.greenzoneEnter: You stepped into an OutlawTwin sanctuary; restricted gameplay is now in effect.
notify.greenzoneExit: You left the OutlawTwin sanctuary; full gameplay is restored.

menu.title: OutlawTwin Zone Designer
menu.subtitle: Configure a custom TwinCoder safe-space before pushing it live.
menu.blipNameDescription: Name of the Outlaw zone on the map
menu.displayTextDescription: Headline broadcast to players while inside
menu.displayTextColorDescription: HTML color code of the banner background
menu.displayTextPositionDescription: Screen position for the Outlaw banner
menu.blipIDDescription: Sprite ID to display on the map

confirm.title: Confirm Action
confirm.content: Are you sure you want to delete your Green Zone?

commands.setzone: Create a temporary OutlawTwin Green Zone
commands.deletezone: Delete a temporary OutlawTwin Green Zone

ui.designerDescription: Review the configuration before broadcasting it to every Twin in town.
ui.confirmDescription: Send the configuration live to every outlaw twin online.
ui.cancelDescription: Go back and tweak the configuration before publishing.
